title: Game Awards 2021 Reactions
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Mark Medina, and a Very Special Guest! -- are discussing Star Wars Eclipse, Suicide Squad, Wonder Woman, and all the big announcements from the Game Awards. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield)
